articles.content:

articles.title: New wrongful death lawsuit filed against City of Austin regarding teen’s suicide in back of APD patrol car - KXAN.com

articles.title: Deutsche Bank to pay more than $100 million in deferred prosecution agreement with federal prosecutors - CNN
articles.description: Deutsche Bank entered into a deferred prosecution agreement with federal prosecutors who allege the bank violated anti-bribery laws while doing business abroad. The bank has agreed to pay more than $100 million in penalties, prosecutors announced Friday.
